title: Nightbringer Yasuo icon with border
body:
Well I baught 140 chaos tokens twice, just to buy this icon. I tought it would work on every champion you played, not just on the nightbringer yasuo skin. This really sucks because I didn't know this. So I am asking if you guys could please refund me or something. And I also suggest putting a disclaimer on it or something, because a lot of people don't seem to know this. 
Thanks in regards.

replies.body: No worries. I've noticed a lot of players didn't realize that you did, in fact, need the skin for the border. Go ahead and reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help.
